description:
Akagami`s unease around Kagura pushes Mia to force them together. With the temple approaching destitution, Akagami, Mia, and Yuzuki call on the temple parishioners to help them pull through. However, their responses aren`t quite what they expected.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Just Got a Little Turned On
ちょっとムラムラしただけだから
